property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Arya Stark attacked alone, each opponent with a Title that opposes your Title must also satisfy the claim of that challenge, if able.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. Joust.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. House Reed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Stark character leaves play, put Meera Reed into Shadows. Any Phase: Bring Meera Reed out of Shadows and into play by paying the rest of her gold cost. Then choose 1 non-plot card (2 instead if it is Winter) and treat its printed text box as if it were blank until end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. Stealth.

property.name: Traits
property.value: The North.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Ser Jaime Lannister to choose and kneel 1 non-Army character controlled by an opponent. Then, if Ser Jaime Lannister has more power on him than that character has STR, discard that character from play. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Lord. House Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which Knight of Flowers attacked or defended alone, he claims 2 power. (Limit once per phase.)

property.value: House Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Highgarden Squire to choose 1 Knight character. That character gains joust until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 of your participating characters has joust, kneel your House card to place the topmost character in your discard pile on top of your deck (into your hand instead if you control more unique characters than each opponent).

property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.value: Attached character gains a War crest. Response: After a challenge in which attached character participated resolves, choose and kill a non-unique participating character.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Queensguard. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: While Ser Barristan Selmy is participating in a challenge, discard a card from your hand to choose 1 participating character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a participating character you control. Until the end of the challenge, that character gains melee. Then, each participating character controlled by an opponent gets -1 STR until the end of the phase.

property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Traits

property.value: House Umber.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After The Smalljon is declared as an attacker against a player with a Title you oppose, raise the claim on your revealed plot card by 1 until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's House Card. Attached House card gains: 'Characters you control get +2 STR during Military challenges.' After the owner of attached House Card wins a Military challenge, claim 1 power for your House if you have more than 1 opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have more than one opponent Varys gains: 'Response: After an opponent declares a challenge, put Varys into Shadows to redirect the challenge against an eligible opponent of your choice, ignoring any Title restrictions.'

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only. Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's House card. If you have more than 1 opponent, after a player wins an Intrigue challenge against the owner of attached House card, kneel Whisper Campaign. Then, the winner of the challenge draws 1 card for each card discarded for claim.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Pay X gold to choose and discard 1 attachment from play. X is the printed gold cost of the attachment.

property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: King. Lord.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Robert Baratheon is attacking alone in a Power challenge, each opponent you are not attacking may declare 1 eligible character as a defender. If you win the challenge, instead of the normal claim effects, each opponent must satisfy the claim effect of that challenge.

property.value: Melee. Renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a Power challenge in which attached character participated, choose and discard from play 1 participating character with 1 or more power on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent declares a challenge against you, discard the top card of each opponent's deck. Then, draw 1 card for each location discarded in this way.

property.value: Unique Greyjoy character only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an unopposed challenge, reveal the top 5 cards of the losing opponent's deck. Choose and discard 2 cards (3 cards instead if it is Winter) and put the rest back on top of the deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: During challenges, total attacking STR is determined by counting the number of participating attackers and total defending STR is determined by counting the number of participating defenders.

Any player may trigger this effect.

property.value: Decree. Condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you are not running an agenda, Seal of the Crown gains: "Players draw 1 additional card during the draw phase. After a players draws 1 or more cards through another card effect, that player must choose and discard 1 card from his or her hand."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to your House card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique characters you control count their STR toward dominance while knelt.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a players wins a challenge agains you as the attacker, he or she may choose to use the claim effect of any challenge type instead of the normal claim effect. This text box cannot be blanked.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have more than 1 opponent, challenges cannot be initiated by your or against you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.
